name: Resume/CV, Cover Letter (Template)
description:
Need to apply for a job? Here's a well-formatted Resume/CV and Cover Letter template.

Over the years, I've been perfecting this Template to perfectly layout the most important aspects of a Resume/CV and a Cover Letter.

Instructions:
Step 1 - Fill in your Professional Information.
Step 2 - Export as a PDF.

Hopefully this helps you in your job search!
